Mixture Cubic Equation of State Class¶

class cubicm(mix, c1, c2, oma, omb, alpha_eos, mixrule)[source]¶

Bases: object

Mixture Cubic EoS Object

This object have implemeted methods for phase equilibrium as for iterfacial properties calculations.

Parameters:
  • mix (object) – mixture created with mixture class
  • c2 (c1,) – constants of cubic EoS
  • omb (oma,) – constants of cubic EoS
  • alpha_eos (function) – function that gives thermal funcionality to attractive term of EoS
  • mixrule (function) – computes mixture attactive and cohesive terms
Tc¶

critical temperture in K

Type:array_like
Pc¶

critical pressure in bar

Type:array_like
w¶

acentric factor

Type:array_like
cii¶

influence factor for SGT

Type:array_like
nc¶

number of components of mixture

Type:int
a_eos : computes the attractive term of cubic eos.
Zmix : computes the roots of compresibility factor polynomial.
density : computes density of mixture.
logfugef : computes effective fugacity coefficients.
logfugmix : computes mixture fugacity coeficcient;
a0ad : computes adimentional Helmholtz density energy
muad : computes adimentional chemical potential.
dOm : computes adimentional Thermodynamic Grand Potential.
ci : computes influence parameters matrix for SGT.
sgt_adim : computes adimentional factors for SGT.
Zmix(X, T, P)[source]¶

Method that computes the roots of the compresibility factor polynomial at given mole fractions (X), Temperature (T) and Pressure (P)

Parameters:
  • X (array_like) – mole fraction vector
  • T (float) – absolute temperature in K
  • P (float) – pressure in bar
Returns:

Z – roots of Z polynomial
Return type:

array_like
a0ad(roa, T)[source]¶

Method that computes the adimenstional Helmholtz density energy at given density and temperature.

Parameters:
  • roa (array_like) – adimentional density vector
  • T (float) – absolute temperature in K
Returns:

a0ad – adimenstional Helmholtz density energy
Return type:

float
a_eos(T)[source]¶

Method that computes atractive term of cubic eos at fixed T (in K)

Parameters:T (float) – absolute temperature in K
Returns:a – atractive term array
Return type:array_like
ci(T)[source]¶

Method that evaluates the polynomials for the influence parameters used in the SGT theory for surface tension calculations.

Parameters:T (float) – absolute temperature in K
Returns:cij – matrix of influence parameters with geomtric mixing rule.
Return type:array_like
dOm(roa, T, mu, Psat)[source]¶

Method that computes the adimenstional Thermodynamic Grand potential at given density and temperature.

Parameters:
  • roa (array_like) – adimentional density vector
  • T (float) – absolute temperature in K
  • mu (array_like) – adimentional chemical potential at equilibrium
  • Psat (float) – adimentional pressure at equilibrium
Returns:

dom – Thermodynamic Grand potential
Return type:

float
density(X, T, P, state)[source]¶

Method that computes the density of the mixture at X, T, P

Parameters:
  • X (array_like) – mole fraction vector
  • T (float) – absolute temperature in K
  • P (float) – pressure in bar
  • state (string) – ‘L’ for liquid phase and ‘V’ for vapour phase
Returns:

density – density vector of the mixture in moll/cm3
Return type:

array_like
logfugef(X, T, P, state)[source]¶

Method that computes the effective fugacity coefficients at given composition, temperature and pressure.

Parameters:
  • X (array_like, mole fraction vector) –
  • T (absolute temperature in K) –
  • P (pressure in bar) –
  • state ('L' for liquid phase and 'V' for vapour phase) –
Returns:

  • logfug (array_like) – effective fugacity coefficients
  • v0 (float) – volume of phase, if calculated
logfugmix(X, T, P, state)[source]¶

Method that computes the mixture fugacity coefficient at given composition, temperature and pressure.

Parameters:
  • X (array_like) – mole fraction vector
  • T (float) – absolute temperature in K
  • P (float) – pressure in bar
  • state (string) – ‘L’ for liquid phase and ‘V’ for vapour phase
Returns:

lofgfug – effective fugacity coefficients
Return type:

array_like
muad(roa, T)[source]¶

Method that computes the adimenstional chemical potential at given density and temperature.

Parameters:
  • roa (array_like) – adimentional density vector
  • T (float) – absolute temperature in K
Returns:

muad – adimentional chemical potential vector
Return type:

array_like
sgt_adim(T)[source]¶

Method that evaluates adimentional factor for temperature, pressure, density, tension and distance for interfacial properties computations with SGT.

Parameters:T (absolute temperature in K) –
Returns:
  • Tfactor (float) – factor to obtain dimentionless temperature (K -> adim)
  • Pfactor (float) – factor to obtain dimentionless pressure (bar -> adim)
  • rofactor (float) – factor to obtain dimentionless density (mol/cm3 -> adim)
  • tenfactor (float) – factor to obtain dimentionless surface tension (mN/m -> adim)
  • zfactor (float) – factor to obtain dimentionless distance (Amstrong -> adim)
